attributes.action: Overbooking flights should be classed as fraud.
attributes.additional_details: Overbooking flights is technically selling people something that does not exist, which is fraud and is illegal.
attributes.background: In light of the shocking event that took place on United airlines regarding a man being forcibly removed from his flight, the government should class overbooking flights as frauds.

rejection.details:
This law is the responsibility of the EU, not the UK Government or Parliament. The European Parliament has a petitions system:

http://www.europarl.europa.eu/atyourservice/en/20150201PVL00037/Petitions
